publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5995.1 Dave Thompson: Continuing Loss of Life at Railway Level Crossings—As an amendment to motion (S3M-5995) in the name of Jamie Stone, leave out from "calls on" to end and insert "welcomes Dave Thompson MSP’s level crossing campaign and the Scottish Government’s efforts to progress this issue."
S3M-5995.1 Continuing Loss of Life at Railway Level Crossings (lodged on 19 March 2010) Rob Gibson*, Bill Kidd*, Kenneth Gibson*, Stuart McMillan*, Bill Wilson*, Joe FitzPatrick*
S3M-5995.1 Continuing Loss of Life at Railway Level Crossings (lodged on 19 March 2010) Christina McKelvie*, Sandra White*
S3M-5995.1 Continuing Loss of Life at Railway Level Crossings (lodged on 19 March 2010) Gil Paterson*
